timeline.message:
Adds process hierarchies and updates SchemaElement anchorGUID description

Signed-off-by: Christopher Grote <chris@thegrotes.net>

timeline.bodyText: These relationships really belong in Area 2 - they describe the linkage between assets and the linkages to other attachments.   All similar definitions are in Area 2.
timeline.author: mandy-chessell

replies.bodyText: They were already defined (from v1.2 onwards) as part of 0598...  Though I guess the area is really just down to the documentation (nothing inherent in the types themselves), so I could change this in the diagrams and markdowns (?)
replies.author: cmgrote

replies.bodyText: (Or sorry, did you mean only the new ProcessHierarchy relationship should be in Area 2?)
replies.author: cmgrote

replies.bodyText: Have pushed a new commit with the entire set of relationships moved to 0298 instead of 0598 + linked these new markdowns and diagrams from the Area-2 base markdown.
replies.author: cmgrote

timeline.message:
Renumbers lineage relationships from 0598 to 0298 and updates linkage at the Area 2 level

Signed-off-by: Christopher Grote <chris@thegrotes.net>
